languages.text: "Я исполняю священный долг служения Богу-Машине. Я намереваюсь защитить этот благословенный корабль и тех слуг Омниссии, кто на нем есть".
"I am fulfilling my sacred duty of service to the Machine God. I intend to protect this blessed ship and the servants of the Omnissiah aboard it."
languages.original_text: "Я исполняю священный долг служения Богу-Машине. Я намереваюсь защитить этот благословенный корабль и тех слуг Омниссии, кто на нем есть".

traits.locale_text: "I am fulfilling my sacred duty of service to the Machine God. I intend to protect this blessed ship and the servants of the Omnissiah aboard it."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am fulfilling my sacred duty of service to the Machine God. I intend to protect this blessed ship and the servants of the Omnissiah aboard it."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「機械神に従事するという聖務を果たしています。この恩寵受けし船とそれに搭乗する万機神の従者を守る意志があるのです」
languages.original_text: "I am fulfilling my sacred duty of service to the Machine God. I intend to protect this blessed ship and the servants of the Omnissiah aboard it."

traits.locale_text: 「機械神に従事するという聖務を果たしています。この恩寵受けし船とそれに搭乗する万機神の従者を守る意志があるのです」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我正在履行我为万机之神服务的神圣职责，我要保护这艘圣船，以及欧姆尼塞亚在这艘船上的所有仆人。”
languages.original_text: "I am fulfilling my sacred duty of service to the Machine God. I intend to protect this blessed ship and the servants of the Omnissiah aboard it."

traits.locale_text: “我正在履行我为万机之神服务的神圣职责，我要保护这艘圣船，以及欧姆尼塞亚在这艘船上的所有仆人。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « J'accomplis mon devoir sacré au service du Dieu-Machine. J'ai l'intention de protéger ce vaisseau béni et les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie à son bord. »
languages.original_text: "I am fulfilling my sacred duty of service to the Machine God. I intend to protect this blessed ship and the servants of the Omnissiah aboard it."

traits.locale_text: « J'accomplis mon devoir sacré au service du Dieu-Machine. J'ai l'intention de protéger ce vaisseau béni et les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie à son bord. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Estoy cumpliendo mi deber sagrado de servir al Dios Máquina. Mi intención es la de proteger esta nave sagrada y los sirvientes del Omnissiah a bordo».
languages.original_text: "I am fulfilling my sacred duty of service to the Machine God. I intend to protect this blessed ship and the servants of the Omnissiah aboard it."

traits.locale_text: «Estoy cumpliendo mi deber sagrado de servir al Dios Máquina. Mi intención es la de proteger esta nave sagrada y los sirvientes del Omnissiah a bordo».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ich erfülle meine heilige Pflicht des Dienstes am Maschinengott. Ich habe vor, dieses gesegnete Schiff und die Diener des Omnissiah an Bord zu beschützen."
languages.original_text: "I am fulfilling my sacred duty of service to the Machine God. I intend to protect this blessed ship and the servants of the Omnissiah aboard it."

traits.locale_text: "Ich erfülle meine heilige Pflicht des Dienstes am Maschinengott. Ich habe vor, dieses gesegnete Schiff und die Diener des Omnissiah an Bord zu beschützen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Makine Tanrı'nın hizmetindeyim, kutsal vazifemi yerine getirmekteyim. Bu kutsanmış gemiyi ve içindeki Hermesih hizmetkârlarını korumak niyetindeyim."
languages.original_text: "I am fulfilling my sacred duty of service to the Machine God. I intend to protect this blessed ship and the servants of the Omnissiah aboard it."

traits.locale_text: "Ben Makine Tanrı'nın hizmetindeyimdir ve kutsal vazifemi yerine getirmekteyim. Bu kutsanmış gemiyi ve içindeki Hermesih hizmetkârlarını koruma niyetindeyim."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
